summary: The diff fully implements REQ-1. A new HamburgerMenu component was added in frontend/src/components/HamburgerMenu.tsx and integrated into the App.tsx header on the right side. It is styled with the neon-green dark theme, toggles a slide-in dropdown panel, supports closing via button click, and includes placeholder items (Calculator, History, About). No constraints were violated.

hallucinated_features.description: An 'About' menu item was added to the navigation panel alongside the requested 'Calculator' and 'History' placeholders.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request only mentions 'Calculator' and 'History' as example placeholder items. 'About' was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Escape key dismissal of the menu panel.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request specifies closing via clicking the button again or a close control, but does not mention keyboard Escape dismissal.

hallucinated_features.description: Outside-click dismissal of the menu panel.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request specifies closing via clicking the button again or a close control. Outside-click dismissal was not explicitly requested.
